content: It's very exciting to see the avalanche of merges. I guess it took an April Fools Day for everyone to recover from their ITP deadline... Is there anyone who wants to take a look at #854? It only adds a file to mathlib. I purposely didn't make things instances, because "there is more than one way to do it". (You can have several reasonable multiplications of sets.)
I think I'll let the people assigned to it review it
btw, I think you merged the same three branches a bunches of time today. I'm thinking it might have been excessive.
My apologies. I was just trying to make sure they were up to date when a reviewer passed by... But I agree that I might have gone overboard...

After Mario's comment we wanted to maximise the chance that the PR was up to date with master when someone looks at it. This PR and 856 are holding up development on the perfectoid project because of a diamond
Okay, I want to merge this. How do I mergify?
